Package org.knime.core.ui.node.workflow

Class RemoteWorkflowContext

java.lang.Object
org.knime.core.ui.node.workflow.RemoteWorkflowContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
WorkflowContextUI, UI
public final class RemoteWorkflowContext extends Object implements WorkflowContextUI
This class holds information about the context in which a remote workflow (e.g. a workflow on a KNIME server) currently resides. It includes information such as the server URL and the workflow path. See also WorkflowContextV2. This class is not intended to be used by clients.
Author:
Martin Horn, KNIME GmbH, Konstanz, Germany

  • Constructor Details

    • RemoteWorkflowContext

      @Deprecated(since="4.5.0") public RemoteWorkflowContext(URI repositoryAddress, String relativePath, String authToken, String mountId, URI mountpointURI, org.knime.core.util.Version clientVersion, org.knime.core.util.Version serverVersion)
      Deprecated.
      use RemoteWorkflowContext(WorkflowContextV2, URI, String, Authenticator, String, URI, Version, Version) instead
      Creates a new context for purely remote workflows (i.e. workflows running on a server).
      Parameters:
      repositoryAddress - the base address of the server repository (the REST endpoint)
      relativePath - the path of the workflow relative to the repository root
      authToken - the JWT to be for authentification
      mountId - the (default) mount id of the server
      mountpointURI - the uri of the workflow inside the mount point
      clientVersion - the version of the client talking to the 'workflow' server
      serverVersion - the version of the server hosting the remote workflow

    • RemoteWorkflowContext

      @Deprecated(since="4.7.0") public RemoteWorkflowContext(URI repositoryAddress, String relativePath, org.knime.core.util.auth.Authenticator authenticator, String mountId, URI mountpointURI, org.knime.core.util.Version clientVersion, org.knime.core.util.Version serverVersion)
      Deprecated.
      use RemoteWorkflowContext(WorkflowContextV2, URI, String, Authenticator, String, URI, Version, Version) instead
      Creates a new context for purely remote workflows (i.e. workflows running on a server or Hub).
      Parameters:
      repositoryAddress - the base address of the server repository (the REST endpoint)
      relativePath - the path of the workflow relative to the repository root
      authenticator - the authenticator
      mountId - the (default) mount id of the server
      mountpointURI - the uri of the workflow inside the mount point
      clientVersion - the version of the client talking to the 'workflow' server
      serverVersion - the version of the server hosting the remote workflow
      Since:
      4.5.0

    • RemoteWorkflowContext

      public RemoteWorkflowContext(org.knime.core.node.workflow.contextv2.WorkflowContextV2 workflowContext, URI repositoryAddress, String relativePath, org.knime.core.util.auth.Authenticator authenticator, String mountId, URI mountpointURI, org.knime.core.util.Version clientVersion, org.knime.core.util.Version serverVersion)
      Creates a new context for purely remote workflows (i.e. workflows running on a server or Hub).
      Parameters:
      workflowContext - the full workflow context
      repositoryAddress - the base address of the server repository (the REST endpoint)
      relativePath - the path of the workflow relative to the repository root
      authenticator - the authenticator
      mountId - the (default) mount id of the server
      mountpointURI - the uri of the workflow inside the mount point
      clientVersion - the version of the client talking to the 'workflow' server
      serverVersion - the version of the server hosting the remote workflow
      Since:
      4.7.0
